item.title: Distributed Cache Series - Part I - Redis
item.description: Introduction For the last couple of weeks, I have been discussing with my colleagues about How can we improve the performance of some of our data access? I will give you some background about the system so that we know our base tenets throughout this blog. Letâ€™s say the system stores the structured data in a database (Amazon DynamoDB) and unstructured data blob in some blobstore (Amazon S3). And, we want to improve the data access latency for both data stores as they provide sub-10ms latency for GET operations.
